imdb.plot outline: The trials and tribulations that Melvin Jackson Jr goes through. From eating tacos before a massage to going on a date with a woman he met on Instagram and it ends up being a date from hell, to getting a surprise visit from his crazy ex-girlfriend.
imdb.title: This is My Life, So Why Are Your Laughing?
akas: This is My Life, So Why Are Your Laughing? (United States)
plot: The day and life of actor, comedian, writer, producer and director Melvin Jackson Jr.::Melvin Jackson Jr.

The trials and tribulations that Melvin Jackson Jr goes through. From eating tacos before a massage to going on a date with a woman he met on Instagram and it ends up being a date from hell, to getting a surprise visit from his crazy ex-girlfriend.::Melvin Jackson Jr.
